item.title: PYPL
item.description: score:-21 Chances: The ClearBridge Large Cap Growth Strategy outperformed its benchmark in the first quarter of 2024 due to active management of its mega-cap exposure and strong stock selection in the growth universe. Risks: PayPal stock has been down 35% in the past five years, performing 121 percentage points worse than the S&P 500 on a relative basis.
